participant_1.background:
I once went on a road trip with Oscar and we saw a lot of cool places.
i am a very bad liar.
i have not gone home in over two years.
i do not trust anyone.
I am not very coordinated, and I often trip over my own feet.

participant_2.background:
I like listening to the Beatles while I'm walking my dog on the beach.
I feed my dogs and take them for a walk before I start my day.
i am also round.
i have one little girl.
i like sports.

content.text: Hi, what's your favorite Beatles song?
Wow, that's a good one. I like listening to the Beatles while I'm walking my dog on the beach.
That sounds lovely. I don't have a dog but I do have one little girl.
Oh cool, how old is she?
Aw, that's a cute age. Are you into sports?
I like playing sports but I don't really watch them.
Me neither. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, go for walks, and hang out with my family.
That sounds nice. I like to go on road trips and see new places.
That sounds fun. I've never been on a road trip before.
You should try it sometime. It's a great way to see new things and meet new people.
I might do that. Thanks for the suggestion.
